subnets.comment: The name of the subnets where yac resources should be placed.

db-subnet-group.comment: The name of the db subnet group where yac rds should be placed.

ntp-servers.comment: The ntp servers that can be polled to sync time. Use a semicolon delimitter

vpcs.comment: the default vpc for each environment (can be overriden myyapp)

prefix.comment: use this prefix at the beginning of the name elements of yac resources, deaults to MAC for My Atlassian Cloud

delimitter.comment: use this delimitter between the name elements of yac resources

camelcase.comment: do not use camelcase on name elements when naming yac resources

cost-center.comment: used to tag resources so resource costs can be rolled up per cost center

owner.comment: used to tag the owner of all yac-related resources in this vpc

cw-log-group-prefix.comment: prefix for cloud watch logs group that yac app logs will be aggregated under

s3-bucket.comment: s3 bucket that my apps will use for stuff like config files, backups, etc.

iam-role.comment: defaults role for all yac-based services, handy for trying out new services

ssh-key.comment: defaults key pair for ssh access to all EC2 instances, handy for trying out new services

ssl-cert.comment: yac defaults to wildcard cert for all yac apps, but nordstrom uses app-specific certs

corporate-cidr.comment: the CIDR defining addresses in your corporate domain (used for security group ingress/egress rules)

dns-cidr.comment: the CIDR defining addresses dns lookup services

http-proxy.comment: outbound http proxy in my vpc

https-proxy.comment: outbound https proxy in my vpc

no-proxy.comment: outbound http proxy in my vpc

proxy-cidr.comment: the cidr for our proxy, used for security group provisioning

name-tag.comment: the name of the CF tag used to establish 'friendly name' of vpcs and subnets

availability-zones.comment: the availability zones to build into

tl-domain.comment: the top-level domain the containers in this vpc will run under

sl-domain.comment: the second-level domain the containers in this vpc will run under

aliases.comment: aliases for apps registered in the yac stack registry

gold-images.comment: snapshot id's for 'gold' images that applications should boot into for our vpc
